modName: Enhanced and Craftable Targe of the Blooded
summary: makes the targe of the blooded craftable at the forge, two seperate varieties (files) one has a reflect damage enchantment, the other has a spellbreaker enchantment...
descriptionHtml:
makes the targe of the blooded craftable at the forge, two seperate varieties (files) one has a reflect damage enchantment, the other has a spellbreaker enchantment...
 if you already have the targe of the blooded equiped when you download my mod, you may need to un equip and then re equip before the enchantments take effect...
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
AS A SIDE NOTE, THIS DOES NOT REMOVE THE BASH BLEEDING DAMAGE. THATS NOT AN ENCHANTMENT ITS A SPELL/PERK ADDED SPECIFICALLY TO THE TARGE
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
i tried to make it in one file with seperate enchants on different shields where you could disenchant and apply the one you wanted to any shield, but when you add either of the enchants to a different shield using the enchanting table, the effects no longer only apply when shield is raised. but also stay actice when shield is lowered until you un equip the shield. so i made two seperate files, one with each until i can find a way around the issue...
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

the optional file is for the burnt/ black wood texture if you want it.

added a daedric shield variant that was requested.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hey for other textures check this mod out to

-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16570

and if youd radther have an even more powerful targe try this mod:

-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17932
author: blackrose86
